mean_cn: adj. 不合逻辑的，不合理的
mean_en: not showing good judgment :not thinking about things in a reasonable or sensible way :not logical
word_etyma: il不，无+logical逻辑的→不合逻辑的
sentence: My body has separated in half and I’m floating! This is so illogical! I must be dreaming.
sentence_trans: 我的身体分成了两半，而且我还在漂浮！这太不合理了！我一定是在做梦！
